name: ext-web-kit
description: Web service kit: router + canonical errors + OpenAPI 3.1 generation (pinned via arch/web).
docs:
Web service kit: router + canonical errors + OpenAPI 3.1 generation (pinned via arch/web).

Modules:
- std.web.core
- std.web.router
- std.web.middleware
- std.web.errors
- std.web.openapi
- std.web.tests

Usage:
- Add dependency: x07 pkg add ext-web-kit@0.1.1
- Pin your API catalog in arch/web.
- Compile a router with std.web.router.compile_from_arch_v1.
- Route requests with std.web.router.route_v1.
- Render OpenAPI with std.web.openapi.render_v1.
